Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
09.01.2012 GB SCR17027 Removed display in the jobjournal the place GB110B with first 5 BAD216 parameters
08.01.2012 GB SCR17027 Added display in the jobjournal the place GB110B with first 5 BAD216 parameters
09.11.2011 SH SCR16880 GB110A Added GB114.PI.INVO_INVDATE = INVO_INVDATE
01.09.2011 JH SCR16721 Changed condition for update INUP_BALANCEFACTORINGC
and INUP_BALANCERETENTIONC
30.05.2011 SH SCR16420 Added PO.VATC, incl. diff. updates
21.03.2011 GB SCR16256 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
18.03.2010 GB SCR15367 Changed condition for update the INUP_FINALPAYMENTDATE
17.12.2009 SH SCR15182 GB110A Fixed mismatch in Locate to obtain CLUP
01.12.2009 SH SCR15113 GB110/GB110A Added period 3 handling (fields
INUP_LASTDATEPERIOD2 and CLUP_MAXDAYSPERIOD2
19.11.2009 SH SCR15028 GB110A Changed calc of commission (based now on
already calculated commission in BSP001A09, send as parameter because the SCHI
updates in BSP001A09 are not finally stored to database)
09.11.2009 SH SCR15039 GB110B Changed BAD216 client input parameter to use
variables from the interest charge client 1/2 regarding the calculated period
19.05.2009 SH SCR14647 Extended update v.INUP_MATURITYDATE for already
existing INUP rows
22.04.2009 SH SCR14407 GB110B Added NULL test for INUP_MATURITYDATE
to set BAD216.PI.TYPE
13.02.2009 SH SCR14407 Added PO.INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO and
PO.INTRSTCHRG_CLNTNO, incl. diff. changes for RF-MF handlings
22.04.2008 SH SCR13537 Introduced handling for PI.BOOKINGTYPE = 8
16.04.2008 SH SCR Added / removed test breaks
18.05.2007 SH SCR12544 GB110C Changed update of INUD_CHARGED and INUD_PRINTED
29.03.2007 SH SCR12406 GB110C step3: Added update on ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT
22.03.2007 SH SCR12270 GB110B/C Replaced CLNT402_DEDUCTION with
CLNT402_ADVANCE for calculation of retention amounts
20.03.22007 SH SCR12376 GB110A Removed test on CLNT624_UPFRONTDEDUCTCOMM
= N to skip calculation of commission
19.03.2007 SH SCR12376 GB110B Removed calc of INUC_INVAMOUNTCHANGEC
from part where V.FACTORINGC is calculated
14.03.2007 SH SCR12368 Added breakes for testing purposes and removed them
07.03.2007 SH SCR12354 GB110B Changed calc for period = 1 and removed calc
for period 2
27.02.2007 SH SCR12271 Multiple changes, see SCR for more details
31.01.2007 SH SCR12270 GB110B/C Multiple changes, see SCR for more details
25.08.2006 MWl SCR11794 Booking type for interest changed
18.10.2005 SH SCR9288 Step1 Undo changes form 14.10.2005 and added new part to
calc v.FACTORINGC in GB110B where v.PERIOD = 1
14.10.2005 SH SCR9288 Step1 Added update of PI.DATEFROM with
INUP_DATELASTINTERESTCALC + 1 if INUP already exists
22.09.2005 JJ SCR9128 A bugfix + change INUP_BALANCERETENTIONC (-1)
21.09.2005 JJ SCR9128 A change INUP_DATELASTINTERESTCALC; C condition store INUD
19.09.2005 JJ SCR9100 Changed B: BAD216.PI.TYPE, C1: INUD_BOOKINGTYPE
09.09.2005 JJ SCR9053 changed requirements
31.08.2005 SH SCR8971 Added new field INUP_FINALLY_PRINTED
-- Reset output parameters
-- Client 1 for interest charges
-- Client 2 for interest charges
-- Variables
-- Preparations
-- Step 1: Interest related booking? If FALSE prepare upfront preparations
-- Step 2: Calculate interest
-- Step 3: Database updates (only if interest was calculated)
-- Init/reset variables
-- The commission is already calculated in the calling program of GB110,
see BSP001A12
-- RF-MF handling
-- Obtain INUD with max(INUD_INVO_NO) if PI.BOOKINGTYPE = 6
-- Init/reset variables
-- First set v.FACTORINGC
-- In case of period 1
... invoice amount increased
... advance %
-- Calculate the interest (ony if PI.DATEFROM > PI.DATEUNTIL)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast( max (sum(INUC_INVFACTORINGCHANGEC), 0) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INUC where INUC_INVO_NO = :2 and INUC_VALUEDATE <= ':3' for fetch only
select max(INUD_BALANCEFACTORINGC) from :1/inud where INUD_INVO_NO = :2 and INUD_DATEFROM < ':3' for fetch only

Text.val: -- Determine interest charge client regarding the current period
4. Set output parameters (PO.INTERESTC is set in GB110B)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(IACH_INTERESTAMOUNTCTEMP) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(IACH_INTERESTAMOUNTVATCTEMP) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/IACH where IACH_INVO_NO = :2 and IACH_DATEPRINTED is null for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store new ACCT row if not exists
-- Store new ACCC row if not exists, else update existing row
